cards.header: Nikuki amajwi hamwe n'umuco ari nkenerwa mumasanamu yo mubwoko bwa video?

cards.text:
## Muriyi nyigisho uzokwiga:  
• Ingene wongereza kuba neza amajwi mu masanamu y'inkuru zawe  
• Ibintu vyambere bituma amajwi adashimisha mu masanamu y'inkuru  
• Ingene wongereza kuba neza ivyerekeye umuco mu masanamu y'inkuru zawe  
• Ingene ukoresha ivyerekeye umuco bitunganije bifatiwe kubintu bizwi wifuza

Amasanamu yawe ashobora gushirwa neza mu nkikuro y'igicapo (cadre), mugabo ufise ijwi (son) n'umuco bibi iyosanamu yawe ntizogira ububasha bikwiye. Ijwi n'umuco vyiza bituma isanamu yawe isa niy'umuhinga kandi bigatuma abandi bifuza kuyihanahana. Bituma inkuru ziri muri iyosanamu yawe bitahurwa.

![](2.png)  
Menya ubushobozi bw'igikoresho ngendanwa cawe. Igikoresho cose ngendanwa gifise uturusho hamwe n'ingorane zaco. Gikoreshe wimenyereze kugira utahure ingene ushobora kuronka ibivamwo (résultats) vyiza.

# Amajwi  
Amasanamu yawe asigura igice c'inkuru iyo at'amajwi meza afise. Guha agaciro keza amajwi ari mwisanamu yawe yomubwoko bwa video nibwo buryo rero bwambere bunyaruka bwo guha agaciro isanamu yawe ya video.
### Induru isanzwe

cards.header: Ingene wokoresha ikiganza cawe kugira ufate neza amajwi mugihe c'umuyaga mwinshi.

cards.text: Nyamba hari umuyaga mwinshi, ijwi (son) ryawe ntirizokumvikana. Tumbereza camera yawe kure y'umuyaga canke ukingire micro. Fuka micro ukoresheje ikiganza cawe canke ikarata izibira uruhande ruvamwo umuyaga. Gukoresha Ikintu gihagarika umuyaga nk'uruhome n'uburyo bwiza mubihe bimwe bimwe.
### Abantu/ Ikirwi c'Abantu

cards.header: Akarorero k'ingene ushobora gufata ikintu canke umuntu neza kiri canke ari mumurwi wibindi bintu vyinshi canke abantu benshi.

cards.text: Ikoraniro ry'abantu canke amabarabara akoreshwa cane aragira induru nyinshi. Ivyo bishobora gutuma ijwi wifuza ritumvikana. Ntugafate amasanamu y'ibiyago bihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interviews) ufise ikoraniro ry'abantu rinini mu mugongo (fond) wabo ubaza ibibazo. Nyamba udashobora kuja mukibanza ciza gusumba, tumbereza camera yawe kure yiryo koraniro ry'abantu hamwe nogusaba yuko abantu ubaza ibibazo baraba mu nzira ijana muriryo koraniro.
### Ama mashine

cards.header: Akarorero kurwamo rw'amajwi atewe nama mashine mugihe uriko urafata amasanamu yo mubwoko bwa video.

cards.text: Générateurs, climatiseurs , réfrigérateurs hamwe n'amatara y'umuco uvanze (fluorescent) vyose nivyuma bituma haba induru ikaze isamaza. Bizimye nyamba bishoboka canke uhindure ikibanza cawe ubishoboye. Induru iva ku matara y'umuco uvanze (fluorescent) kenshi iragoye kwirinda.
### Ubuhinga bw'ivyamajwi (acoustique)

cards.header: Akarorero k'ijwi ribi rirengerana ayo bita mururimi rw'igifaransa ama echo audio bivuye nko kuhantu harehare hegeranye nkama corridors mururimi rw'igifaransa.

cards.text: Witondere ivyerekeye ubuhinga bw'ivyamajwi (acoustique) mucumba canke ingene ijwi (son) rigaruka riva ku mpome. Ibibanza nka salles de bains carrelées canke couloirs bikunda kugarura ijwi hamwe nokurisubiramwo n'induru nyinshi. Ivyumba bifise ibikoresho bigumana (absorbant) amajwi murivyo nka amatapi, amarido canke intebe zoroshe (meubles rembourrés) nivyiza cane gusumba.
### Utugozi bita ama ecouteurs mururimi rw'igifaransa dukoreshejwe nka micro

cards.header: Ingene bakoresha utugozi twitwa ama ecouteurs mururimi rw'Igifaransa nka micro.

cards.text:
Nyamba igikoresho ngendanwa cawe gikorana na écouteur ifise micro yokuvugiramwo baguhamagaye, bishobora kuba vyiza. Micro ya écouteur yawe ishobora gukoreshwa yinjijwe muri camera igihe uriko urafata amasanamu. Bigerageze imbere yuko ushaka kubikoresha, mugabo bishobora kuba uburyo bwiza bwogufatiramwo amajwi (audio) meza mubiyago bihagarikiye kubazwa ibibazo (interview).  
Nyamba ibi bidashobotse ukonyene, gerageza ugire iyugururwa rizana (téléchargement) rya Open Camera kandi uce uyishiramwo nka application ya camera yawe yikoresha.
# Umuco
### Gufata ibintu birihanze

cards.header: Ingene umurika neza ico kintu canke umuntu.

cards.text:
• Gufata amasanamu yohanze Kumurango niyo nzira yoroshe kugira umenye neza yuko ibintu bizagukunda. Niyo ari iminsi ipfutse (couvert) n'ikibanza ciza cokuronkeramwo umuco mwiza.  
• Fata isanamu y'abantu bawe isoko ry'umuco (source de lumière) ribatumbereye. Iyo isoko ry'umuco ritumbereye inyuma y'abantu bawe, abantu uriko urafata amasanamu bazoca birabura cane kandi bigorane kubabona. Ubu buhinga bushobora gukoreshwa mukunyegeza ibiranga umuntu mukubuza camera kubona neza mumaso habo.

cards.header: Ingene ushobora gukoresha umuco usanzwe uhari kugira umurike ikintu canke umuntu neza.

cards.text: ### Gufatira amajwi indani munzu

cards.header: Kwirabuza canke gutera umwijima mu maso yico kintu canke umuntu.

cards.text: Nyamba uriko ufata ibintu biri munzu, gerageza uronke icumba gifise umuco uva kuzuba mwinshi murico kugira uronke igikorwa kivuyemwo ciza. Icara umugongo wawe uraba ku madirisha kandi wicarike abo uriko urabaza ibibazo baraba iyo umuco uzanana kugirango umuco wizuba ubamurike mumaso. Nyamba ubicaritse imigongo yabo iraba mwidirsha ugaca ufata amasanamu urabisha iyo umuco uzanana, camera izosoma ivyanditswe  bivuye kugicapo kiyagayaga cane mu nkikuro y’igicapo (frame) kandi ice yugara ijisho ryayo kugira ntigire surexposition y’isanamu. Ibi bizogira ingaruka yuko abo wariko ubaza ibibazo bagira amabara menshi (silhouette) mw’ifoto, n’ubuhinga bwiza nyamba ushaka yuko  ibiranga abo ubaza ibibazo biguma binyegejwe mugabo sibwiza nyamba ushaka kobamenyekana.

cards.header: Ingene utegura gufata ifoto kugira wirabuze (obscur) mumaso y'umuntu.

cards.text: ### Umuco ugenda urahindagurika

cards.header: Ingene ukoresha ico bita reflecteur iyo uri hanze.

cards.text: Ushobora gukoresha ikintu cose cera --- urupapuro, ibigura (carton) --- canke ikintu cose giserura umuco kiwugarura k'umuntu uriko urafata ifoto. Umuco udakwiye ushobora gutanga amasanamu mabi. Gufatira amafoto hanze canke ahantu harizuba ryinshi bishobora kuguha umuco mwiza.

![ ](13.png)  
#### Gufotora ikintu kiri hafi.  
Amasanamu fatiwe nko kumetero 1 n'igice yico kintu aba ari meza cane.

## IBINTU VYO KWIBUKA  
### Ijwi (son)  
• Ijwi n’ikintu gikwiriye minsi yose gufatwa nkakama iyo uriko urafata amasanamu  
• Nyamba ijwi ryawe ridashobora gukoreshwa, birashoboka yuko urikuramwo kandi ukarisubiriza nirindi ijwi ritandukanye canke ntushiremwo ijwi nagato  
• Ijwi n’igice c’inkuru mw’isanamu (video), bifate nkakama musanamu yose ifatwa  
#### Umuco  
• Gufata amasanamu uri hanze canke uri mucumba kirimwo umuco wizuba mwinshi bishobora kuguha umuco mwiza.  
• umuco muke ushobora gutanga amasanamu adashimishije.  
• Witwararike yuko umuco waka kubantu uriko urafata amasanamu;  abantu bari rétroéclairé kenshi baza basa na silhouette  
• Umuco usanga uri nko ku metero 1 niwo uba uboneka neza  
• Ntiwiturire --- ambara ibikoresho bigukingira (gants) kugira ukoreshe ibijanye n’umuco

cards.question: Ni hehe ushobora kuronka gusumba umuco mwiza?
Mbega n'igiki wokoresha kugira ukingire micro yawe?
Mbega nihehe hashobora kuva umuco mugihe woba uriko urafata amasanamu yo mubwoko bwa video?

choices.text: Aha hafi nyene y'ico kintu canke uwo muntu.
